<hr>

Available Martini 2 polymer topologies are listed below according to their major category. In addition, you can use [`Martini_PolyPly`](https://github.com/fgrunewald/Martini_PolyPly) to generate `GROMACS` `.itp` files of polymers from a monomer `.itp`-file and generate coordinates of polymer molecules from a complete topology file. 

**References to these works can be found in the headers of the corresponding `.itp` files.**

### Branched polymers
<hr>

|         Molecule                    |     Coordinates   |    Topology   |     Mapping      |
|-------|---------------------------------------|--------|------|
|Poly(amidoamine) dendimer (PAMAM)	| [martini_v2.0_PAMAM_G5.gro](https://martini-library.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/ff_parameters/martini2/polymers/pamam/martini_v2.0_PAMAM_G5.gro) |[[itp]](https://martini-library.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/ff_parameters/martini2/polymers/pamam/martini_v2.0_PEO_PS_CNP.itp)   |  Not available |

### Collections
